description.en:
EROTICA is a 100% decentralized communitybuilding experiment to bring more elegant erotic NFTs to this world,

EROTICA tokens will incentivize and facilitate NFT collaborations with leading porn stars and adult content creators.

EROTICA token holders can donate to the official EROTICA partnership wallet. The EROTICA team will use the EROTICA tokens donated to facilitate leading porn stars and adult content creators NFT collaborations with special NFTs reserved for EROTICA token holders.
